textSub.name: para1
textSub.string: Remember all the trouble those barracuda gave you back in\n the reef? Well, it's payback time. A school of barracuda\n sounds like a Bonus Stage snack, doesn't it?

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
HINT:
 Grab a Feeding Fury bubble to chow down and save some
 precious time! You get bonus points for any time left over
 at the end of a bonus stage.
